Description:
The resource retrieves reasons for visit from a patient’s encounters. This includes any reason for visit information that was recorded in the patient’s chart by a clinician during any previous encounter.

This resource can be queried by a patient ID or an encounter ID.

category.Name: category
category.Description:
Always “reason-for-visit” for this API.
Multiple category values are allowed if the requestor is authorized to search multiple Condition categories.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: Reference to an encounter resource the condition is for.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to a patient resource the condition is for.
patient.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Reference to a patient resource the condition is for.
subject.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided.

code.Description: External codings for the condition. If a list of codes is sent, they're listed in this element.

encounter.Name: encounter
